This full 2-day 
      course will focus on the 1992 AND 2002 ISDA Master Agreements and the 1994 
      ISDA Credit Support Annex/Paragraph 13 with a complete examination of all 
      provisions. Additionally, critical legal and credit issues will be 
      discussed:
Understand transactions subject to the 
        Agreement 
Understand the ISDA Master Agreement & 
        Schedule 
Learn the documentation risks 

Learn pitfalls in Schedule 
        negotiations 
Understand the credit issues 

Understand the ISDA Credit Support 
        Annex 





Anyone who currently works with the ISDA 
      Master Agreement including: 

Attorneys and Paralegals 
Credit Professionals 
Contract Administrators 
VPs, Directors, Managers, Supervisors 
        in marketing, finance, credit and legal








90% of attendees at recent 
      sessions of our OTC Master Agreement seminar have graded it as above 
      or slightly above their expectations and learning objectives.
